mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products ( product_id, product_name, purchase_price, selling_price, unit_quantity, stock, category_id, point_enabled, reg_date, reg_by ) VALUES ( 'A010020', #{product_name}, #{purchase_price}, #{selling_price}, #{unit_quantity}, 0, #{category_id}, CASE WHEN category_id = '1' THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END, NOW(), 12);
